product_name: Pepper's Cutthroat Polarized Floating Sunglasses - Men's
long_description: Designed with the waterman in mind, the Pepper's Cutthroat polarized floating sunglasses keep your eyes shielded from the harmful, damaging rays of the sun while on the water.
